author: Kenneth Ayoob

text: Another heavily influencial Arcade game, this time from Sega and the great Yu Suzuki, a true pioneer in the industry. His influence on Arcade games back then with Hang-On, Space Harrier, Outrun, After Burner, Virtua Fighter, Virtua Racing and Daytona really can't be overstated. Space Harrier was one of the first widely popular rail shooters. This great theme is a classic and a fun fact: Hideki Kamiya from Platinum Games was inspired to work in the games industry because of this game. I guess that explains this theme's cameo in Bayonetta!
